data.TITLE: MANTLED MUSIC
data.address: 32 OLUFEMI ROAD, OFF OGUNLANA DRIVE, SURELE, LAGOS.
data.about:
Mantled Music Studios is a fast rising studio which started in 2015 as an initial alternative for the production of an indie Artist.
But today has become a studio that harnesses several professional approaches to achieving that desired sound you crave and conceptualize.
We work with you hand in hand from idealizatuon to the release of your project.
Our staff has gathered several years of experience to help bring your ideas to fruition.
So be at peace and relax as we ensure you have the best.
